description: Comprehensive test queries for Discord AI Agent covering all core capabilities

queries.query: Analyze message activity patterns across all buddy groups in the last 30 days
queries.description: Tests ability to analyze cross-channel data and identify patterns in group activities

queries.query: What are the most engaging discussion topics in the agent-ops channel this week?
queries.description: Tests analysis of technical discussions and engagement metrics

queries.query: Show me conversation threads that generated the most responses and mentions in general-chat
queries.description: Tests thread analysis and response tracking capabilities

queries.query: Identify users who are most active in sharing resources and links across all channels
queries.description: Tests user behavior analysis and resource sharing patterns

queries.query: Analyze the flow of information from announcements to community responses in the last week
queries.description: Tests information flow analysis and community response tracking

queries.query: Summarize all feedback and suggestions made about AI practical applications workshops
queries.description: Tests feedback aggregation and workshop improvement insights

queries.query: Create a summary of member experiences and challenges shared in the non-coders learning channel
queries.description: Tests educational feedback summarization for learning programs

queries.query: Summarize community feedback on Discord server structure and channel organization
queries.description: Tests server improvement feedback analysis

queries.query: What AI topics and technologies are trending in discussions this month?
queries.description: Tests AI trend identification and technology tracking

queries.query: Identify emerging collaboration patterns and project ideas mentioned across buddy groups
queries.description: Tests collaborative trend analysis and project identification

queries.query: Track the evolution of agent-ops discussions and identify trending methodologies
queries.description: Tests technical trend tracking in specialized channels

queries.query: Compile all questions about AI model training and the answers provided by community experts
queries.description: Tests Q&A extraction and knowledge compilation for AI training topics

queries.query: What are the most frequently asked questions about prompt engineering and optimization?
queries.description: Tests FAQ identification and prompt engineering knowledge extraction

queries.query: Extract questions and solutions shared about AI implementation challenges in business contexts
queries.description: Tests business-focused AI Q&A extraction

queries.query: Generate engagement statistics for the top 10 most active channels over the past month
queries.description: Tests comprehensive channel engagement analytics

queries.query: Provide statistics on new member onboarding and introduction patterns
queries.description: Tests new member analytics and onboarding effectiveness

queries.query: Calculate response times and interaction rates for questions posted in help and Q&A channels
queries.description: Tests support effectiveness and community responsiveness metrics

queries.query: Analyze channel utilization and suggest which buddy groups might benefit from merging or splitting
queries.description: Tests channel optimization and structural recommendations

queries.query: Examine information flow between admin channels and general community channels to identify communication gaps
queries.description: Tests communication flow analysis and identifies structural improvements

queries.query: Recommend best practices for channel engagement based on analysis of most and least active channels
queries.description: Tests engagement pattern analysis and best practice identification

usage_instructions.testing: Use these queries to validate agent capabilities across all core functions
usage_instructions.benchmarking: Measure response quality, accuracy, and completeness for each capability area
usage_instructions.development: Identify areas needing improvement based on query performance
usage_instructions.community_value: Queries designed to provide actionable insights for community management

success_criteria.accuracy: Responses should be factually correct based on actual Discord data
success_criteria.completeness: All expected elements should be addressed in responses
success_criteria.actionability: Insights should be practical and implementable by target audiences
success_criteria.relevance: Responses should directly address the specific community context
